    public abstract class RelatedItemsContainerBase
extends com.adobe.cq.sightly.WCMUse

        protected void buildRelatedProductPath(RelatedProducts rp,
                                       com.st.olm.cq.api.products.STProduct parentProduct)
        Build path up related product tree for a given related product. Creates new parent objects if needed or links existing parent objects
        Parameters:
        rp - bottom node in related products hierarchy
        parentProduct - parent ST product

      • createRelatedProduct

        protected RelatedProducts createRelatedProduct(com.st.olm.cq.api.products.STProduct product,
                                               boolean setHasRestricted)
        Create a new RelatedProducts object. Called only when an existing object does not exist
        Parameters:
        product - ST Product on which to init object
        setHasRestricted - flag to indicate if child object to be added is restricted or contains restricted objects
        Returns:
        new RelatedProducts object
